text: It's a way of helping you literally SEE how math works.

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0016.mp4
text: When math is just a bunch of numbers and symbols on a page, it can be pretty abstract and hard to relate to.

text: But graphing is like a window into the abstract world of math that helps us see it more clearly.

text: In fact, the focus of our lesson today actually looks a bit like a window.

text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0018.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0019.mp4
text: ...and it's called "The Coordinate Plane".
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0019.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0019.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0019.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0020.mp4
text: The coordinate plane is the platform or stage that our graphing will take place on.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0020.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0020.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0020.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0021.mp4
text: But to understand how it works, we first need to start with its closest relative; The Number Line.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0021.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0021.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0021.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0022.mp4
text: You remember how a number line works, right?
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0022.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0022.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0022.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0023.mp4
text: A number line starts at zero, and represents positive numbers as you move to the right and negative numbers as you more to the left.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0023.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0023.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0023.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0024.mp4
text: And there's usually marks showing where each integer is along the way.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0024.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0024.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0024.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0025.mp4
text: Now imagine cloning that number line and rotating the copy counter-clockwise by 90 degrees so that the second number line is perpendicular to the first and they intersect at their zero points.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0025.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0025.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0025.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0026.mp4
text: What we have now is a "number plane". It's basically like a 2-Dimensional version of a number line, but that second dimension makes it much more useful.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0026.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0026.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0026.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0027.mp4
text: With a simple 1-Dimensional number line, we could show where various numbers were located along that line by drawing (or plotting) points.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0027.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0027.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0027.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0028.mp4
text: But no matter how many points we plot, they're always on the same line.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0028.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0028.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0028.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0029.mp4
text: But with a 2-Dimensional number plane, we can plot points anywhere in that 2D area, and that opens up a whole new world of possibilities.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0029.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0029.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0029.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0030.mp4
text: With a 1-Dimensional number line, plotting points was easy.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0030.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0030.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0030.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0031.mp4
text: You just needed one number to tell you where to plot a point.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0031.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0031.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0031.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0032.mp4
text: But with a 2-Dimensional number plane, you actually need TWO numbers to plot each point.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0032.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0032.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0032.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0033.mp4
text: These two numbers are called "coordinates" because they're the same 'rank' or 'order' and they work together to specify the locations of a point on the number plane.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0033.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0033.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0033.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0034.mp4
text: In fact, that's why the number plane is often referred to as the "coordinate plane".
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0034.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0034.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0034.pt

text: It's the stage for plotting coordinates.

text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0035.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0035.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0036.mp4
text: Coordinates use a special format to help you recognize them.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0036.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0036.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0036.pt

text: The two numbers are put inside parentheses with a comma between them as a separator.

text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0037.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0037.pt

text: So when you see 2 comma 5 or negative 7 comma 3 or 0 comma 1.5 you know you're dealing with coordinates.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0038.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0038.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0038.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0039.mp4
text: Okay, to understand how coordinates work, remember that our number plane is formed by combining two perpendicular number lines.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0039.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0039.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0039.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0040.mp4
text: From now on, we're going to refer to each one of these number lines as an "axis".
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0040.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0040.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0040.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0041.mp4
text: One of the axes is horizontal (like the horizon) which means the other axis is vertical (or straight up and down).
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0041.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0041.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0041.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0042.mp4
text: And they're often called the "horizontal" and "vertical" axes because of that.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0042.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0042.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0042.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0043.mp4
text: But even more often, the axes are referred to by variable-based names.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0043.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0043.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0043.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0044.mp4
text: The horizontal axis is called "the X-axis" and the vertical axis is called "the Y-Axis".
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0044.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0044.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0044.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0045.mp4
text: Why use variable names?
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0045.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0045.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0045.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0046.mp4
text: Well there's two good reasons.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0046.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0046.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0046.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0047.mp4
text: The first is that variable names are more flexible than horizontal and vertical, which relate to a specific orientation in space that may not always be relevant.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0047.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0047.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0047.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0048.mp4
text: And the second reason is that each of the two coordinate numbers is actually a variable that relates to a specific position along one of the two axes of the coordinate plane.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0048.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0048.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0048.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0049.mp4
text: And since those variables are usually called 'X' and 'Y', it makes sense to name the two axes the same way.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0049.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0049.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0049.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0050.mp4
text: The first coordinate number listed will be called 'X' and the second coordinate number listed will be called 'Y'.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0050.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0050.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0050.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0051.mp4
text: And we're always going to list the numbers in that same order, 'X' first and then 'Y', so that we never get confused about which is which.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0051.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0051.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0051.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0052.mp4
text: In fact, coordinates are often called "ordered pairs" because they're a pair of numbers that are always listed in the same order: 'X' value first... 'Y' value second.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0052.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0052.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0052.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0053.mp4
text: So if you have the coordinates, (3, 5) that means X = 3 and Y = 5.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0053.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0053.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0053.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0054.mp4
text: Pretty easy, right?
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0054.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0054.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0054.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0055.mp4
text: But now how do we actually plot these coordinates (or ordered pairs) on the coordinate plane?
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0055.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0055.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0055.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0056.mp4
text: Well, the first number in the ordered pair tells you where along the X-Axis the point is located, and the second number in the ordered pair tells you where along the Y-Axis the point is located.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0056.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0056.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0056.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0057.mp4
text: The two numbers in an ordered pair work together to define a single point, and each one of the numbers only gives you half of the information about where that point is.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0057.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0057.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0057.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0058.mp4
text: To see how this works, let's plot the coordinates (3, 2) First, we locate the X value along the X-axis, which is at 3 in this case.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0058.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0058.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0058.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0059.mp4
text: But instead of putting a point there, we draw (or just imagine) a line perpendicular to the X-axis that goes through the 3.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0059.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0059.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0059.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0060.mp4
text: We do that because the first number in the ordered pair only tells us where along the X-axis the point is, but it could be ANYWHERE along the Y-axis.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0060.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0060.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0060.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0061.mp4
text: We won't know that until we plot the second number.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0061.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0061.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0061.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0062.mp4
text: So temporarily, we just draw a line there to represent every possible point that could have an X value of 3.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0062.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0062.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0062.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0063.mp4
text: Next, we locate the Y value along the Y-axis, which is at 2 in this case.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0063.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0063.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0063.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0064.mp4
text: But again, instead of putting a point there, we draw (or just imagine) a line perpendicular to the Y-axis that goes through the 2.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0064.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0064.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0064.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0065.mp4
text: We do that because the second number in the ordered pair only tells us where along the Y-axis the point is, but it could be ANYWHERE along the X-axis.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0065.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0065.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0065.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0066.mp4
text: So we just draw a line there to represent every possible point that could have a Y value of '2' Ah, but look what we've got now.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0066.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0066.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0066.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0067.mp4
text: The first line represents all the possible locations where X equals 3.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0067.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0067.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0067.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0068.mp4
text: And the second line represents all the possible locations where Y equals 2.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0068.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0068.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0068.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0069.mp4
text: And the exact point where the two lines intersect represents the only point in the entire coordinate plane where both X = 3 and Y = 2.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0069.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0069.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0069.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0070.mp4
text: That intersections is the location of our point.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0070.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0070.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0070.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0071.mp4
text: Pretty cool, huh? And that's a really good way to understand how the coordinate plane works.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0071.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0071.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0071.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0072.mp4
text: But I want to show you an even easier (and more intuitive) way to actually plot points.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0072.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0072.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0072.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0073.mp4
text: This more intuitive way involves starting with a point at the origin of the coordinate plane and then treating the coordinates like a set of simple instructions that tell you how far to move your point in the X and Y directions.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0073.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0073.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0073.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0074.mp4
text: For example, to plot the coordinates (3, 2) like before, we start by imagining a point at the origin (0, 0) Then, we look at the first number in our ordered pair to see how far we need to move our point in the X direction.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0074.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0074.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0074.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0075.mp4
text: Since X is positive 3, we move our point a distance of 3 units in the positive X direction.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0075.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0075.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0075.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0076.mp4
text: And then from there, since Y is positive 2, we move our point a distance of 2 units in the positive Y direction.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0076.pt

text: So that's a pretty easy method for plotting points!

text: Let's try it a few more times so you get the idea.

text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0078.pt

text: Let's plot the coordinates (-4, 3).

text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0079.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0079.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0080.mp4
text: Again, we start by imagining a point at the origin and then let the coordinates tell us how far to move it along the X and Y axes.

text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0080.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0080.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0081.mp4
text: Since X is negative 4, we move the point a distance of 4 units, but this time in the negative X direction which is to the left.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0081.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0081.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0082.mp4
text: And then, since Y is positive 3, we move the point a distance of 3 units in the positive Y direction.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0082.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0082.pt

text: Now let's plot the coordinates (-3, -3).

text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0083.pt

text: In this case, X and Y are both negative, so starting with a point at (0, 0) we move it 3 units in the negative X direction, and then 3 units in the negative Y direction.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0084.pt

text: And last, let's plot the coordinates (4, -2.5).

text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0085.pt

text: Starting at (0, 0) we move the point 4 units in the positive X direction and then 2 and 1/2 units in the negative Y direction.

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0087.mp4
text: Okay, so we've plotted four ordered pairs the easy way, and did you notice that each of these points is located in a different region of the coordinate place.

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0088.mp4
text: These four regions are called "Quadrants" and their boundaries are defined by the two axes of the coordinate plane.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0088.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0088.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0089.mp4
text: The quadrants are named 1 through 4 so we can easily refer to them in conversations if we need to.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0089.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0089.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0090.mp4
text: Quadrant 1 is the upper right quadrant, and it contains all of the points where both the X and Y values are positive.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0090.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0090.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0091.mp4
text: Quadrant 2 is the upper left, and it contains all of the points that have a negative X value and a positive Y value.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0091.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0091.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0092.mp4
text: Quadrant 3 is the lower left, and it contains all of the points that have both a negative X and a negative Y value.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0092.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0092.pt
text_fea: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0092.pt

video: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0093.mp4
text: And Quadrant 4 is the lower right, and it contains all of the points that have a positive X value and a negative Y value.
video_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0093.pt
text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0093.pt

text: Roman Numerals are usually used to label the four quadrants and they're in that order because that's the order you would encounter the quadrants if you started with a line segment from the origin to the coordinate (1,0).

text: And then rotated that line counter-clockwise around the origin.

text_latent: ./clip_video/Algebra Basics： Graphing On The Coordinate Plane - Math Antics [9Uc62CuQjc4]/videos/clip_0095.pt

text: Doing this sweeps out a shape called a "unit circle" which is divided into four quadrants just like the coordinate plane.
